summary: Rust and fast. Long handle axe named Ranka.
descriptionHtml:
[center][i][size=3][img]https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-WHerntvprjw/V69me8bQEJI/AAAAAAAAEDA/VLO25QNLW8kBW12IEXYu8NLljZhPhiK9gCLcB/s1600/r_X_tr.png[/img]

[img]https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-sX8vPcFDQwU/V63Wp5m_gnI/AAAAAAAAEB0/Qe-9l_wJlg4Uo4PMFOUQCYZa9fUQRVzewCLcB/s1600/description_plate.png[/img]

[/size][/i][i][size=3]This rusty long handle axe helps you quickly reach your enemies flesh. There is not a clumsy-huge-butcher-barbarian-blade. [/size]
[size=3]Just a convenient tool for killing things.
[/size]
[size=2]Simple, as it possible, axe.
Low poly model.
[/size][/i][i][size=2]1024 textures.[/size]


[img]https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-E5dLRzqzK1g/V63V0raw9EI/AAAAAAAAEBo/l7dgml4cXu4Ykt5zTBG6kTHtTACkfmAQgCLcB/s1600/stats_plate.png[/img]
         
 [u]1H[b] Version:[/b][/u]
[/i][i][/i][size=2][i]Damage: 15[/i][i]
[/i][i]Reach: 1.800[/i][i]
[/i][i]Speed: 1.2[/i][i]
[/i][i]Crit.damage: 5[/i][i]
[/i][i]Crit.Chance: 25%[/i][i]
[/i][i]Stagger: 1.25[/i][i]
